title: Kundan and Emerald Grand Bridal Haar
materials: this magnificent haar features intricately placed Kundan stones. Adorned with vibrant green emeralds and lustrous South Sea pearls. Exquisite setting with Hyderabadi Polish.
features: A masterpiece of traditional Indian craftsmanship. The haar showcases a grand design featuring delicate floral motifs and intricate filigree work. The emerald accents add a regal touch, while the pearl drops provide a graceful movement. The pendant is a statement piece with kundan floral design set with central emerald.
colors: Primarily gold and white (Kundan) with pops of vibrant green (Emeralds) and creamy white (Pearls). A classic South Indian color palette representing prosperity and auspiciousness.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Vivaham/పెళ్లి)
and other significant celebrations. Ideal for brides seeking to make a statement with traditional yet elegant jewelry. Also suitable for Seemantham (Baby Shower) and other festive events.
description: This Kundan Haar is a timeless piece of art, blending traditional craftsmanship with modern design sensibilities. The high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and durability. The emeralds symbolize prosperity and the pearls represent purity, making it a perfect heirloom piece.
